#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
typedef unsigned long long int  ll;
bool comp(string a,string b)
{
string x,y;
x.assign(a);
y.assign(b);
x.append(b);
y.append(a);
if(x.compare(y)<0)
return true;
return false;

/*
int arr1[45],arr2[45];
int i=0;
ll x=a,y=b;
while(x!=0)
{
arr1[i++]=x%10;
x/=10;
}
while(y!=0)
{
arr1[i++]=y%10;
y/=10;
}
ll x1=b,y1=a,j=0;
while(x1!=0)
{
arr2[j++]=x1%10;
x1/=10;
}
while(y1!=0)
{
arr2[j++]=y1%10;
y1/=10;
}
int m=i-1,n=j-1;
while(m>=0 && n>=0)
{
if(arr1[m]>arr2[n])
return true;
else if(arr2[n]>arr1[m])
return false;
m--;
n--;
}*/
return false;
}
main()
{

int t,n,i;
string  array[200];
scanf("%d",&t);
char c;
while(t--)
{
scanf("%d%c",&n,&c);
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
cin>>array[i];
sort(array,array+n,comp);
for(i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
cout<<array[i];
printf("\n");
}
return 0;
}
